title: Bug 117981: Unable to select any item at the first attempt in the library outline view
description:
Description: When using the library outline view, it is not possible to select any item on the first attempt.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label to the library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select the label item.

Observed Behavior: Any item cannot be selected at the first time in the library outline view. Instead, the focus immediately jumps to the library file node in the outline view.

Expected Behavior: Upon selecting the label item in the library outline view, it should remain selected without any immediate focus shift.
OB: Any item cannot be selected at the first time in the library outline view. The focus immediately jumps to the library file node in the outline view.
EB: Upon selecting the label item in the library outline view, it should remain selected without any immediate focus shift.
SR:
1. Add a label to the library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select the label item.
